message.text: `7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Welcome to The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: This is a swiss tournament where you will ${tournament-action} with your partners against other teams with the same number of wins.
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Each round will have a randomly chosen kit for you to ${tournament-action} your way to victory with!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Your first kit will be...
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: In round 2 your kit will be...
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: And for the grand finale...
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Get ready, the first round is about to commence in 10 seconds!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Let The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament begin!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Brace yourselves, the second round starts in 10 seconds!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Prepare for the `6final showdown`r, starting in 10 seconds!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: May the best team win!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `4Red `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `9Blue `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `2Green `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `5Purple `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `eYellow `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `fWhite `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `dPink `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Congratulations `7Gray `ron winning The Grand ${tournament-type} Tournament!

trigger.filter: all(all-arena-spectator, participating)

filter.id: all(any(all(current_round=1, round-1-starting), all(current_round=2, round-2-starting), all(current_round=3, round-3-starting)), not(between-rounds))

message.text: `7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Let's make this sudden death a little... `cexplosive`r!
